# List of castles in the Czech Republic

This is a list of castles and chateaux in the Czech Republic, organized by regions.
s from that region.]]
Central Bohemia (S)
Hradec Králové (H)
Karlovy Vary (K)
Liberec (L)
Moravia-Silesia (T)
Olomouc (M)
Pardubice (E)
Plzeň (P)
Prague (A)
South Bohemia (C)
South Moravia (B)
Ústí nad Labem (U)
Vysočina (J)
Zlín (Z)
